title: Why Donald Trump's shoulder pads are all people talking about
content: Shoulder pads are garment props used to make one's shoulders broader than they actually are. As former US president Donald Trump gave an interview to Elon Musk on Monday, Donald Trump's shoulder pads are all people taking about. In a viral photo, as Trump is speaking, his shoulder pads can be seen separate failing to cover his drooping frame.
summary: Shoulder pads are garment props used to make one's shoulders broader than they actually are. As former US president Donald Trump gave an interview to Elon Musk on Monday, Donald Trump's shoulder pads are all people taking about. In a viral photo, as Trump is speaking, his shoulder pads can be seen separate failing to cover his drooping frame.

title: When Trump said Kamala looked like Melania on Time cover: 'Beautiful...'
content: Donald Trump called Kamala Harris beautiful in a bizarre moment that took place in the two-hour-long interview of the former US president taken by Elon Musk. Though Trump tore into Kamala and her administrative, political skills, he said in the picture of her on the Time Magazine, she looked beautiful -- almost like Melania Trump. "She looked very much like our great first lady, Melania. She didn’t look like Camilla (Kamala). Of course, she's a beautiful woman and we'll leave it at that," Trump said. Elon Musk agreed saying, "Right...well yeah".
summary: Donald Trump called Kamala Harris beautiful in a bizarre moment that took place in the two-hour-long interview of the former US president taken by Elon Musk. Though Trump tore into Kamala and her administrative, political skills, he said in the picture of her on the Time Magazine, she looked beautiful -- almost like Melania Trump. "She looked very much like our great first lady, Melania. She didn’t look like Camilla (Kamala). Of course, she's a beautiful woman and we'll leave it at that," Trump said. Elon Musk agreed saying, "Right...well yeah".

title: 'It is rare': Trump campaign office in Virginia burglarised, investigation underway
content: Over the weekend, a burglary was reported at a campaign office for Donald Trump in Virginia. The Loudoun County sheriff's office is investigating whether anything was stolen from the Ashburn office, which serves both the Trump campaign and the Virginia 10th district republican committee. Surveillance footage showed a suspect in dark clothing carrying a backpack. The investigation continues.
summary: Over the weekend, a burglary was reported at a campaign office for Donald Trump in Virginia. The Loudoun County sheriff's office is investigating whether anything was stolen from the Ashburn office, which serves both the Trump campaign and the Virginia 10th district republican committee. Surveillance footage showed a suspect in dark clothing carrying a backpack. The investigation continues.

title: Royal secrets in the sky: Flight attendant's note reveals Queen Elizabeth II’s personal preferences
content: Recently uncovered notes from a British Airways flight attendant revealed Queen Elizabeth II's preferences during a 1989 tour of Singapore and Malaysia, including her fondness for martinis and Velamints. Elizabeth Evans' memorabilia, which also includes items from celebrities aboard the Concorde, will be auctioned soon, offering a glimpse into a bygone era of luxury travel.
summary: Recently uncovered notes from a British Airways flight attendant revealed Queen Elizabeth II's preferences during a 1989 tour of Singapore and Malaysia, including her fondness for martinis and Velamints. Elizabeth Evans' memorabilia, which also includes items from celebrities aboard the Concorde, will be auctioned soon, offering a glimpse into a bygone era of luxury travel.

title: Russia steps up assaults on Pokrovsk front in Ukraine's east
content: Russian forces increased their attacks on the Pokrovsk front in eastern Ukraine, with the largest number of battles in a day reported in a week, according to the Ukrainian military. Focused around Hrodivka and Zhelanne, the battles represented more than a third of those along the 1,000-kilometer front. The escalation follows Ukraine's cross-border incursion into Russia's Kursk region.
summary: Russian forces increased their attacks on the Pokrovsk front in eastern Ukraine, with the largest number of battles in a day reported in a week, according to the Ukrainian military. Focused around Hrodivka and Zhelanne, the battles represented more than a third of those along the 1,000-kilometer front. The escalation follows Ukraine's cross-border incursion into Russia's Kursk region.

title: Meghan Markle felt Prince Harry 'deserved more' materially from the royals: Report
Vance’s alleged drag photo: Is Trump’s VP pick a doppelgänger for Ivanka?
content: An old photo of JD Vance, Trump’s VP pick, in drag has caused a stir online. The Trump-Vance campaign hasn't verified the photo, which is claimed to be from his Yale Law School days. Amid the mixed reactions, Vance’s controversial stance on LGBTQ issues adds to the intrigue surrounding the picture.
summary: An old photo of JD Vance, Trump’s VP pick, in drag has caused a stir online. The Trump-Vance campaign hasn't verified the photo, which is claimed to be from his Yale Law School days. Amid the mixed reactions, Vance’s controversial stance on LGBTQ issues adds to the intrigue surrounding the picture.

title: Indians who prepaid $1,000 for Tesla EVs demand refunds: What went wrong?
content: In 2016, Elon Musk invited Indians to pre-order the Tesla Model 3, generating excitement. However, many, including tech entrepreneur Vishal Gondal, faced delays and have yet to receive their cars. Market challenges, high import duties, and competition from local brands have complicated Tesla's entry into India. The EV market in India remains small, with Tata Motors leading in sales.
summary: In 2016, Elon Musk invited Indians to pre-order the Tesla Model 3, generating excitement. However, many, including tech entrepreneur Vishal Gondal, faced delays and have yet to receive their cars. Market challenges, high import duties, and competition from local brands have complicated Tesla's entry into India. The EV market in India remains small, with Tata Motors leading in sales.

title: US elections: Harris cautiously outlines 2024 agenda - 'Building consensus' for democratic victory
content: Kamala Harris positioned herself for the 2024 election by addressing past policy weaknesses and outlining her governance vision. Following Biden's decision not to run, she updated her policy stances, focusing on the economy. Her notable proposal to end federal taxation of tipped earnings aligns with Trump’s plan. Harris emphasized bipartisan achievements during the Biden-Harris administration.
summary: Kamala Harris positioned herself for the 2024 election by addressing past policy weaknesses and outlining her governance vision. Following Biden's decision not to run, she updated her policy stances, focusing on the economy. Her notable proposal to end federal taxation of tipped earnings aligns with Trump’s plan. Harris emphasized bipartisan achievements during the Biden-Harris administration.

title: 'My rights were violated’: Texas women accuse hospitals of denying care for life-threatening pregnancies
content: Two Texas women filed federal complaints against hospitals for denying care during their life-threatening ectopic pregnancies, claiming severe injuries. The law firm representing them, the Center for Reproductive Rights, cited confusion following Roe v. Wade's overturn as the cause. Hospitals face investigation by the US Department of Health and Human Services.
summary: Two Texas women filed federal complaints against hospitals for denying care during their life-threatening ectopic pregnancies, claiming severe injuries. The law firm representing them, the Center for Reproductive Rights, cited confusion following Roe v. Wade's overturn as the cause. Hospitals face investigation by the US Department of Health and Human Services.

title: ‘I am a lesbian’: TikToker banned for life by American Airlines over alleged ‘sex with man’ on flight
UK unemployment, wages growth drop: Official data
content: Britain's unemployment rate dropped to 4.2 percent in the second quarter, from 4.4 percent, contrary to analyst expectations. Wage growth, excluding bonuses, also decreased to 5.4 percent, the lowest since August 2022. The data, released by the Office for National Statistics, hints at the cooling labor market, which may influence further interest rate cuts by the Bank of England.
summary: Britain's unemployment rate dropped to 4.2 percent in the second quarter, from 4.4 percent, contrary to analyst expectations. Wage growth, excluding bonuses, also decreased to 5.4 percent, the lowest since August 2022. The data, released by the Office for National Statistics, hints at the cooling labor market, which may influence further interest rate cuts by the Bank of England.

title: RFK Jr disqualified from contesting for New York’s ballot after court's ruling
One dead as Greek wildfire burns in Athens suburbs
content: Greece's worst wildfire of the year resulted in one death and continued to burn near Athens, despite efforts by hundreds of firefighters and waterbombing aircraft to contain it. The blaze, which started near Varnavas, spread to suburbs, leading to evacuations and significant damage. Expected high winds and temperatures could exacerbate the situation.
summary: Greece's worst wildfire of the year resulted in one death and continued to burn near Athens, despite efforts by hundreds of firefighters and waterbombing aircraft to contain it. The blaze, which started near Varnavas, spread to suburbs, leading to evacuations and significant damage. Expected high winds and temperatures could exacerbate the situation.

title: Taliban say three civilians killed in Pakistan border clash
content: Taliban authorities accused Pakistani forces of killing three civilians, including a woman and two children, during clashes near the Torkham border crossing in Afghanistan's Nangarhar province. The exchange of fire, reportedly triggered by disagreements over construction along the Durand line, left three Pakistani soldiers wounded. Border tensions have escalated since the Taliban took power in 2021.
summary: Taliban authorities accused Pakistani forces of killing three civilians, including a woman and two children, during clashes near the Torkham border crossing in Afghanistan's Nangarhar province. The exchange of fire, reportedly triggered by disagreements over construction along the Durand line, left three Pakistani soldiers wounded. Border tensions have escalated since the Taliban took power in 2021.

title: 'Does Trump wear dentures?': Former US president's pronunciation sparks debate during Musk interview on X
Ukraine keeps up air attacks on Kursk as Putin lashes out at West
content: Ukraine conducted new drone attacks on Russia's Kursk region, destroying 12 drones. President Putin criticized the West for supporting Ukraine's incursion which seized 1,000 sq km. Ukraine's commander confirmed continued advances. Over 180,000 people evacuated from Kursk and Belgorod regions amid ongoing battles. Moscow attributed the attacks to Western intervention aimed at stalling Russian operations.
summary: Ukraine conducted new drone attacks on Russia's Kursk region, destroying 12 drones. President Putin criticized the West for supporting Ukraine's incursion which seized 1,000 sq km. Ukraine's commander confirmed continued advances. Over 180,000 people evacuated from Kursk and Belgorod regions amid ongoing battles. Moscow attributed the attacks to Western intervention aimed at stalling Russian operations.

title: Indian American Impact mobilising support among the community for Harris
content: Indian American Impact, a group promoting Indian Americans in US politics, mobilized significant support for Vice President Kamala Harris's Presidential campaign. The organization implemented grassroot strategies like phone banking and canvassing in states with large Indian diasporas such as Michigan and Pennsylvania, while also raising funds and recruiting volunteers to boost voter turnout among South Asian communities.
summary: Indian American Impact, a group promoting Indian Americans in US politics, mobilized significant support for Vice President Kamala Harris's Presidential campaign. The organization implemented grassroot strategies like phone banking and canvassing in states with large Indian diasporas such as Michigan and Pennsylvania, while also raising funds and recruiting volunteers to boost voter turnout among South Asian communities.
